body.name: Van Heusen Men's Comfort Stretch Reversible Dress Belt
features: STRETCHES FOR MORE COMFORT The stretch lining of the belt gives you up to 2 inches of extra comfort Don't ever feel too tight when wearing this versatile dress belt
REVERSIBLE BELT This versatile belt by Van Heusen gives you two dress style options in just one belt Pull the buckle at hinge and rotate it to align with desired strap Perfect for a man on the go
SOPHISTICATED TOUCH Add a sophisticated touch to all your business attire with this reversible and stretch belt Also ideal to dress up your casual outfits on weekends Strap width is 1 3/8” width
SIZE AND CARE DIRECTIONS For best fit shop belt size 2” larger than your pant size For example if your pant size is 34” shop belt size Medium-36” For best care spot clean only
body.description: An essential accessory in every men's wardrobe, this Van Heusen men's belt will feel secure and comfortable for all-day wear. This belt features a 2-in-1 reversible comfort stretch belt strap that allows you to create versatile styles while saving space in your closet. Respectable refinement at its best, this belt from Van Heusen is the perfect addition to your collection.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #200,807 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry) #816 in Men's Belts

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ABOUT THE BRAND Known for revolutionary style since 1921, Van Heusen meets the needs of the modern professional with stylish and innovative classics. From dress shirts with collars that stretch half an inch and suits featuring natural stretch, to belts made with comfort flex material, one thing is certain: uncomfortable clothing is now history.

A MORE SUSTAINABLE FUTURE We're working hard to eliminate single use plastic from packaging by 2024, use only 100% sustainable cotton by 2021, 100% sustainable polyester and nylon by 2025, drive innovation for circularity, support water-stewardship programs, and get involved in our communities.

Men's Comfort Stretch Reversible Dress Belt Men's Comfort Stretch Dress Belt Boys' Double Loop Dress Belt Boys' Reversible Dress Belt Category Men's Men's Boys' Boys' Style Reversible Dress Dress Reversible Material 45% Polyurethane, 55% Bonded Leather 35% Polyurethane, 22% Web, 43% Ethylene 60% Polyurethane, 34% Polyester, 6% Bonded Leather 60% Polyurethane, 34% Polyester, 6% Bonded Leather Stretch Up to 2 inches of extra comfort Up to 2 inches of extra comfort Standard Standard

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Slight stretch helps keep your pants up!
reviews.reviewText: As advertised, Van Heusen reversible brown/black belt that has a slight stretch to it, which helps keep your pants up! These are hard to find unless you buy the cloth web weave belts, which are much more casual. Sized accurately and looks great. As a bonus it arrived 5 days earlier than expected! Thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best bet ever for skinny and belly guys... Sorry ladies it may work for you to.
reviews.reviewText: Truly the best belt you will ever own. You can have a plumbers crack or just suffer from Dun-Lap Diseases (Belly over the belt). I have no "ass" as a skinny male.... best belt I ever owned. I only ask that you understand that their "AD" on Amazon "PREYS" on us weak and belly large. You must understand that the sale looks like two (2) belts but you only get one if you do not pay attention.... Be aware of these SMALL Amazon dealers. They will take advantage of you and by the time you realize you lost a few dollars from an ad that "THEY KNOW" is called Super Marketing for their sales.....they will still take your cash.... and to fight and to get your money back is something they think you will give up on... Beware! Buy from anyone else.... Hell if they made and still sold this belt in America I would not be warning you.... and, YES I bought it here because.... End

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Two sides quickly separate with use
reviews.reviewText: It's a nice-looking belt and the stretch feature is helpful for middle-aged men (no more need be said). However, after consistent use for half a year or so, the cheap material pulls apart, and you have a shredded-looking belt, unpresentable in public.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very nice belt, only time will tell to se if it’s real leather

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice quality
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for a gift the quality of this belt is real nice and love the fact that is a double sided belt very nice

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This belt is my husbands favorite. We used to buy it at Belk but lately they have not had any in his size, so I turned to Amazon, which never disappoints! It was a birthday gift!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I had a "stretchy" reversible Dockers belt that I needed to replace. This belt looked like a good alternative. It's a decent belt, and it looks good. I don't regret buying it and have been using it. However, it doesn't have as much stretch "give" as the Dockers (it's much less stretchy, actually). Of course, I have a 33 waist, which is right in between the two choices of belt lengths. I opted for the 34-36 length since I was worried about being a little tight in the 30 (yikes!)- 32 length. Hence, the belt is a bit too long (gotta slip the end into the pant loop), but not obscenely so.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it so much I ordered another
reviews.reviewText: I know, i know...it's a belt. But this one looks very nice, is reversible and stretches. I replaced all my belts with this. Literally the only way to make it better would be a plastic buckle so I could get through airport security without taking it off
